home_design_ai: Home Design AI - Innovative Interior Design

hero_title: Create a Virtual Design in Less Than 5 Minutes
how_it_works_title: How AI Creates a Design for Your Room
how_it_works_subtitle: Save hours of time and thousands on designer fees. With our AI-powered tool, you can instantly furnish and style any room photo to attract more buyers for a fraction of the traditional cost.
step1_title: 1. Upload a photo of your room
step1_desc: Upload existing photos of the room, with or without furniture.
step2_title: 2. Let our AI furnish the room
step2_desc: The AI will furnish the room in your chosen style.
step3_desc: Download professionally processed photos and put the property on the market.
traditional_step2: Contact them and wait for a response
traditional_step3: Agree on a price for each photo
traditional_step5: Wait 48 hours to get the result
traditional_step7: Put the property on the market
upload_placeholder: Upload an image to see it here
compare_placeholder: Need original and transformed image to compare
upload_prompt: Drag and drop or click to upload
marketing_title: Power Your Property Marketing with NeuroDécor
marketing_subtitle: Beautiful listings sell faster. Use our intuitive dashboard to create, organize, and showcase staged properties that capture buyer attention.
marketing_card1_text: Staging cuts time on market by nearly 90% compared to non-staged homes.
marketing_card2_text: 58% of buyers’ agents say staging "positively influenced" buyers’ view of the home.
marketing_card3_text: 29% of agents see a 1-10% price increase due to staging (5-15% is common).
marketing_card4_text: Only 1 in 10 buyers can picture a home’s potential if it’s unstyled.
pricing_title: Save Over $150 on Every Property Virtually Staged with NeuroDécor
pricing_subtitle:
The average cost of virtual staging a property in the United States is $120.
Our packages start from $20.
refund_text: Not satisfied with the results? We will provide a full refund.
trusted_by: Trusted by the best real estate agents
faq_subtitle: Explore common questions from realators and individuals.
faq1_question: How do I create an account?
faq1_answer: Simply choose a pricing option above, you’ll be prompted to create your account during checkout.
faq2_answer: Within the dashboard, you can contact support by submitting a ticket. We aim to respond within 24 hours.
faq3_question: Who owns my virtually staged images?
faq3_answer: You do. Once your images are generated, you have full ownership and usage rights.
faq4_question: How long does it take to virtually stage a room?
faq4_answer: Each room takes about 5-10 seconds to stage. Multiple images can be processed at once to save time.
faq5_question: What is the maximum number of rooms I can stage?
faq5_answer: You can stage any amount of rooms per property. You’re only limited by the number of credits in your account.
faq6_question: If I do not use all of my staging credits one month do they roll over?
faq6_answer: Yes, unused credits never expire and can be used anytime (with an active subscription).
terms_welcome: Welcome to Neuro Decor ('we', 'our', or 'us'). These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services available at https://www.neurodecor.site/. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
terms_acceptance_text: By using Neuro Decor, you affirm that you are at least 18 years old and eligible to enter into this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
terms_services_text: Neuro Decor provides AI-powered virtual staging services. Users can upload property images to receive staged versions using our proprietary AI tools. Subscription tiers or pay-as-you-go credits may apply.
terms_accounts_text:
To access certain features, you must create an account. You agree to:

- Provide accurate and complete information
- Keep your login credentials secure
- Be responsible for all activities under your account.
terms_content_text:
You retain ownership of any images or content you upload.

By uploading content, you grant Neuro Decor a limited license to process, store, and display your content for the purpose of providing services to you.

You are responsible for ensuring you have the rights to any content you upload.
terms_ip_text: All intellectual property associated with the Neuro Decor platform, including software, branding, and AI-generated staging outputs, remains the property of Neuro Decor or its licensors. You may not reverse-engineer, copy, or distribute any part of our service without prior written permission.
terms_payments_text:
Payments are processed securely through LiqPay. When purchasing a plan or credits:

- You agree to pay all applicable fees
- Subscriptions may auto-renew unless canceled.

Refunds are available only in accordance with our refund policy. We offer a 100% refund if you are unsatisfied with your staged images and contact us within 7 days.

Refunds are available only in accordance with our refund policy. We offer a 100% refund if you are unsatisfied with your staged images and contact us within 7 days.
terms_use_text:
You agree not to use the service to:

- Upload illegal, harmful, or infringing content
- Attempt to disrupt or compromise the platform
- Misrepresent your identity or misuse another’s account

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms. No refunds will be provided.
terms_liability_text:
Neuro Decor is provided 'as is.' While we strive for accuracy and reliability, we make no warranties regarding:

- The availability or performance of our service
- The suitability of AI staging for specific sales outcomes

To the fullest extent permitted by law, Neuro Decor shall not be liable for indirect or consequential damages.
terms_termination_text: You may cancel your account at any time. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate access to the service for any reason, including violation of these terms.
terms_law_text: These terms are governed by the laws of Ukraine. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of this jurisdiction.
terms_contact_text:
If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

Email: denys@neurodecor.site
privacy_intro: At Neuro Decor ('we', 'our', or 'us'), accessible at https://www.neurodecor.site, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information in accordance with Ukrainian privacy laws and international standards like GDPR.
privacy_info_text:
We collect the following types of personal information:

- Account Information: Name, email address, password.
- Payment Information: Billing details (processed securely through third-party vendors like Liqpay).
- Uploaded Content: Photos or images you submit for staging.
- Usage Data: Pages visited, IP address, browser type, device information.
- Marketing Data: Interactions with emails, ads, and analytics tools.
privacy_how_we_use_text:
We use the information collected to:

- Create and manage your account
- Provide and improve our virtual staging services
- Process transactions and send confirmations
- Deliver customer support
- Send marketing communications (you may opt-out at any time)
- Analyze usage to enhance user experience
- Comply with legal obligations
privacy_third_party_text:
We use trusted third-party vendors to help operate our business:

- Analytics: Google Analytics to track website usage.
- Payments: Liqpay for secure payment processing.
- Email & Marketing: Platforms like Mailchimp to send updates and offers.
- Advertising: Cookies and tracking pixels (e.g., Meta, Google Ads) to serve relevant ads.

These services may collect data independently according to their own privacy policies.
privacy_cookies_text:
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to:

- Remember your preferences
- Analyze website traffic
- Personalize content and advertising

You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy_uploads_text: When you upload photos for virtual staging, they are processed by our AI systems and stored securely. You retain full ownership of your original images and the staged results.
privacy_storage_text: Your information is stored securely using reliable cloud services. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacy_rights_text:
Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

- Access, correct, or delete your personal information
- Withdraw consent for marketing
- Lodge a complaint with a data protection authority (e.g., OAIC in Australia)

To exercise your rights, please contact us via the email below.
privacy_contact_text:
If you have any questions or concerns about this policy, please contact:

Email: denys@neurodecor.site
privacy_updates_text:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

Last updated: 6/25/2025
